description: Deployed a production-ready application using Flask hosted on AWS EC2 with Docker.
Configured and optimized Nginx as a reverse proxy and DNS server to reducing manual overhead and latency for end-users and enhance application routing and performance.
Secured and optimized VPS with SSH hardening, UFW firewall configuration, and automated updates for improved server and network security along with easy maintenance.
Developed Flutter-based IoT app for air purifiers, enabling users to control their devices and monitor AQI.
Integrated graphs and dashboard analysis for the user to track quality and control their air purifiers.
Enhanced the developer experience by 70% by incorporating Get-cli and Firebase for efficient data management.
Started as a member, promoted to Technical Lead, overseeing up to 3 development projects and guiding collaborative development initiatives and technical strategies within the club’s technology team.
Conducted sessions, provided guidance, resolved technical inquiries and communicated with other team members to ensure smooth development.
Led development as Project Lead for a Collaboration App connecting developers with open source opportunities, conducting weekly code reviews to ensure clean, modular and maintainable code.
Partnered with a team of 4 to develop an application for event management, facilitating seamless event uploads and registration processes
Worked with cross-functional teams to integrate feedback and enhance app functionalities, resulting in 60% improvements in managing events, participants, and registrations for the club
